summary: Fight Falmer bosses and troopers at Helgen...
descriptionHtml:
This mod gives you the chance to fight the falmers horde at Helgen (temporary arena)  The Boss are category 5 and at level60, melee troopers are at least 40. Hope you survive the horde. The esp holds a horde troop of 20 foes, if you would like to up the challenge, just copy the Horde falmer.esp and paste into the data folder, rename it to horde falmer addon1.esp and there you have 40 angry falmers now. Just do the same if you like more, and every increment is at 20 falmers. Have fun!

Optional file
Save the girls!
The falmers captured these girls and gave them a chance to fight to survive or be eaten alive. The challenge here is how many of them can you save?  Put the addon into the data folder together with the main file.
author: simplesim

files.name: Horde falmers addon save the girls
files.fileName: Horde falmers addon save the girls-10759-1-00.7z
